description: Describe all the PPA Information included in the ZoneData object

___palId.description: List of one or more PAL Database record IDs.

___ppaExpirationDate.description: Date of the PPA expiration date, in format YYYY-MM-DD

___cbsdReferenceId.description: List of one or more CBSD Reference IDs in the cluster list of the PPA.

___ppaBeginDate.description: Date of the start of the PPA protection period, in format YYYY-MM-DD
